      • createDbAction

        public abstract Action createDbAction(Permission perm)
        The action handler must set the database settings onto the node configurations.
        Parameters:
        perm - Designated permission of the action.
        Returns:
        The action with parameters necessary to create a database.

      • createDb

        protected abstract Database createDb(Node node)
        Parameters:
        node - Node with initialized database connection settings.
        Returns:
        A provided database to operate on.

      • dbPermission

        public abstract Permission dbPermission()
        Required permission level to create and modify databases.
        Returns:
        Required permission level.

      • onWatchAdded

        protected void onWatchAdded(Watch watch)
        Override to handle newly created watches. Can be used to add custom actions to the watch.
        Parameters:
        watch - Watch that was added.

      • createDbNode

        public NodeBuilder createDbNode(java.lang.String name,
                                ActionResult res)
        Called before actually creating the database and typically used in the action handler of createDbAction(org.dsa.iot.dslink.node.Permission).
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the database.
        res - Invocation result to retrieve the necessary node to create the database node.
        Returns:
        An incomplete node builder that must be built after initialized.

      • createAndInitDb

        public Database createAndInitDb(Node node)
        Creates the database and typically used in the action handler of createDbAction(org.dsa.iot.dslink.node.Permission) after createDbNode(java.lang.String, org.dsa.iot.dslink.node.actions.ActionResult) has been called.
        Parameters:
        node - Database node to initialize.
        Returns:
        An initialized database that has been connected to.
        See Also:
        For creating the node.

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(Node node)
        When the requester is connected, subscribe to all the paths.
        Parameters:
        node - Database node.

        public void deleteDb(Node node)
